# triangle

**Instance Property**

An enumeration that specifies which triangle unit-triangular, triangular, and symmetric matrices need to use.

## Declaration

```swift
var triangle: SparseTriangle_t { get set }
```

## Discussion

If [doc://com.apple.accelerate/documentation/Accelerate/SparseAttributes_t/kind] is [doc://com.apple.accelerate/documentation/Accelerate/SparseOrdinary], this operation ignores this propoerty. Otherwise, it indicates which triangle ([doc://com.apple.accelerate/documentation/Accelerate/SparseUpperTriangle] or [doc://com.apple.accelerate/documentation/Accelerate/SparseLowerTriangle]) represents the matrix.

## Instance Properties

- **transpose**: A Boolean value that specifies whether to implicitly transpose the matrix.
- **SparseTriangle_t**: A structure that defines which triangle a symmetric matrix stores, or whether a triangular matrix is upper or lower.
- **kind**: An eumeration that specifies whether the matrix is ordinary, unit-triangular, triangular, or symmetric.
- **SparseKind_t**: A structure that defines whether the matrix is ordinary, symmetric, or triangular.
